channel.title: salsa on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in salsa on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Pico de Gallo
item.description: Ingredients 6 Tomatoes 1 Onion 1 Bunches of Cilantro 2 Fresh Jalapenos 3 Canned Jalapenos (La Costena) 3 oz Juice from the Canned Jalapenos 3 Fresh Lemons or 3oz Lemon Juice Concentrate Salt to Taste Directions Chop Tomatoes in to 1/4 inch pieces Finely Chop Onions Trim Stems from Cilantro and chop Chop both types of Jalapenos Combine chopped ingredients with the juices of the Lemon and the Jalapenos and mix together adding salt to suit your taste

item.title: Nectarine Salsa
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups diced nectarine (about 3) 1/2 cup diced red bell pepper 1/4 cup thinly sliced onion 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro leaves 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh lime juice 2 teaspoons minced, seeded jalapeno pepper 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt 1/2 cup diced, peeled avocado Directions Combine everything but the avocado in a bowl. Gently stir in avocado.

item.title: Doug's Home Made Salsa
item.description: Ingredients 1/3 bunch of cilantro 1/2 small white onion 2 cloves of garlic 1 can diced fire roasted tomatoes 1 small can of diced green chiles 1/2 tsp of ground oregano 1/2 tsp black pepper Dash of salt Dash of ground cayenne pepper Dash of red pepper flake Juice of 1/2 a lime Directions Combine in food processor and chop to desired consistency.
